attributes.action: Bring back the number 34 bus. Leigh to Manchester
attributes.additional_details: Speak to the Manchester council about getting it back
attributes.background: The number 34 bus route has been scrapped - half of the community including old people get around on this bus and we can’t believe it

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about local bus services are a matter for bus operators and the relevant local authorities, not the UK Government or Parliament.

You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, by entering your post code here: https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
